content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll generate a report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Smelting Area (Position x=0-4, y=0-4)
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace 1 (position x=0, y=0) - Copper plate production
- Furnace 2 (position x=2, y=0) - Copper plate production  
- Furnace 3 (position x=4, y=4) - Iron plate production

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (position x=6.5, y=11.5) holding iron plates
- Burner inserter (position x=7.5, y=11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine (position x=9.5, y=11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter (position x=11.5, y=11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest (position x=12.5, y=11.5) storing iron plates, copper plates and electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water (positions x=-9.5 to -7.5, y=22.5-23.5)
- Boiler (position x=-7.0, y=24.5)
- Steam pipes (position x=-5.5, y=24.5-26.5)
- Steam engine (position x=-2.5, y=24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting various machines

### Science Pack Handling (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position not specified)
- Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=30.5)
- Storage chest (position x=0.5, y=31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Errors
- Cannot research already researched technologies (Electric Energy, Steel Processing, Electronics, Logistics 2, Automation)
- Cannot research technologies with missing prerequisites:
  - Electric Engine requires Lubricant
  - Logistics 3 requires Production Science Pack
  - Battery requires Sulfur Processing
  - Fluid Handling requires Engine
  - Oil Processing requires Fluid Handling

### API Usage Errors
- Invalid technology names used: Engine, EngineUnit, FluidHandling - Use correct technology enum values
